div.p: Students Dismissmal Update: The county superintendents, after consultation with the public health officers in six Bay Area counties, have announced the extension of campus closures through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.
To contact the Brisbane School District Office please call 415-467-0550 or email bsd@brisbanesd.org.

h2.a: Superintendent Updates and Letters to the Community

div.h2: The Brisbane School District graduates students who are thoughtful, prepared, and engaged citizens. Our program emphasizes conceptual understanding, teaching the Common Core State Standards through year-long themes. With an emphasis on higher order thinking skills, we focus on understanding, evaluating, and creating. We thread Lifeskills throughout our curriculum with the goal of providing our children the tools for citizenship and life.

h3.strong: Due to the Shelter In Place Order, the Board Meeting Format has been changed to a Virtual Meeting.

p.strong: Brisbane School District Regular Meeting of the Board of Trustees

div.p: This meeting will be conducted pursuant to the provision of the Governor’s Executive Order N-35-20, issued March 21, 2020, allowing for deviation of teleconference rules required by the Brown Act and pursuant to the order of the Health Officer of San Mateo County, dated March 16, 2020, as this meeting is necessary so that the Brisbane School District can conduct necessary business and is permitted under the under as an essential governmental function.

p.strong: The Board of Trustees invites the community to participate in the meeting virtually.

div.p: The board meeting will be streamed live. Please check back for participation instructions.

Due to the Shelter In Place Order, the due date for the Health Exam Report for School Entry for new students enrolling for the 2020-2021 school year has been extended to Wednesday, July 1, 2020. Health Exams can be sent via email to bsd@brisbanesd.org or mailed to Brisbane School District at 1 Solano St, Brisbane, CA 94005.

div.h2: Board Meeting Videos (RECENT) (Archived for the school year)

h3.a: Regional Meal Programs offering lunches during the shelter in place period.

p.a: Locations for Flu Shots and Vaccines for Youth (some may offer free services)

a.strong: Check the Parent Enrollment Information Tab for Registration applications for the 2020-2021 School Year

p.strong: The 2020-2021 School Year Registration will start on Monday, February 3, 2020. On Monday, February 3, 2020 applications will be accepted starting at 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM at the Mission Blue Center located at 475 Mission Blue Drive, Brisbane, CA 94005. After Monday, February 3, 2020 applications can be submitted from 8:30 AM - 4:00 PM at the Brisbane School District Office located at 1 Solano Street, Brisbane, CA.

div.p: Brisbane School District Board of Trustees supports the exploration, development, and continuation of educational and practical initiatives at the local school level to address environmental challenges and create a healthier environment for District students, families, and communities.

p.a: Board of Trustees Resolution 2019-2020, No. IV Commitment to Environmental Sustainability Actions
